- Tired of typing the same thing over and over? Want to avoid typos? Use text expansion! 
- Unlike Play Store apps or other extensions, CrosKeys works in both the Web and Android environments. And coming soonâ€¦Linux support!

- Press ALT + \ to access the CrosKeys Clipboard window. 
- Expand the Chrome OS Clipboard history with up to 20 items!
- Highlight tabs and add them to the CrosKeys Clipboard with a click! 
- Drop text, images, and files into the Clipboard Manager to save for later!
- Drag from the Clipboard Manager to send files between the Android, Linux, and Chrome Environments! 
- Sequentially paste by pressing Shift + Enter.
- Search and share your Clipboard easily! 
- CrosKeys Pro members can save thousands of entries to their history!

Access pro features for $14.99 if you only need access to expanded Text Snippets, QuickNotes, QuickLinks, and up to 500 Clipboard History items.

- We use the latest, most secure extension technologies from Google to accomplish what we do. Manifest Version 3 keeps you safe from harmful extensions and we embrace it wholeheartedly. 

- Chrome extension keyboards like CrosKeys cannot log information typed in a password field, keeping you secure!

- Still worried? Donâ€™t be! Just turn off CrosKeys with a simple shortcut:  â€œCTRL + Space.â€ When you need it again, turn it back on with the same keys!

- CrosKeys Pro payments are handled by Stripe. This system is used and trusted by Google, Amazon, Zoom, and others.

- CrosKeys Pro sign-ups are handled through ExtensionPay. This library is open-source, allowing you to read and verify every line of code contained within it.

*Linux developer mode not yet supported. 
**https://developers.google.com/apps-script/guides/services/quotas
